name: Druid Circle
description: A sacred grove or stone circle serves as a center for druidic magic and nature worship. The natural magic provides opportunities for healing and nature-based research, while the spiritual focus can create tension with more urban authorities.
atmosphere: Ancient standing stones arranged among living trees create a natural temple where druids conduct seasonal rituals. Wild herbs and natural magic fill the air while animals show no fear of visitors. Carved symbols mark the sacred space. Perfect harmony between stone and living wood.
